welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kayapinar, Turkey! Get ready to be charmed by the city's rich history, beautiful architecture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kayapinar has to offer.

restaurants.name: Chocc'o Mint Patisserie
restaurants.description: Chocc'o Mint Patisserie is a café located in Diyarbakır.
restaurants.address: Diclekent mah. Mahabad bulvarı (75.cadde üzeri) Özaklar rüya kent sitesi c blok no: 39/A Kayapınar/Diyarbakır (75 Yol), Diyarbakır

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Diyarbakir Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
